Package FMS.entities

Class Flight

  • Object
    • FMS.entities.Flight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Flight>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Charter, ScheduledFlight
    public abstract class Flight
extends Object
implements Comparable<Flight>
    A flight in the flight management system (FMS).
    A flight stores information about place and time of departure and arrival as well as the aircraft and personnel involved. Both crew and passengers can be added to a flight. A flight is ready for boarding as soon as one crew member is assigned (added to the flight). Passengers can be listed (added) and only listed passengers can board the flight. Passengers can only board one flight at a time. Flights are naturally ordered by ID.
    Author:
    TeM

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      the scheduled departure of this flight in UTC.
      private String destination
      the destination of this flight as a three letter code.
      private String flightID
      the number of this flight.
      private String origin
      the origin of this flight.
      private java.util.Set<Passenger> passengers
      the passengers added (listed) on this flight.
      private Aircraft vessel
      the aircraft assigned to this flight, if any.

    • Field Detail

      • flightID

        private String flightID
        the number of this flight. example: OS501. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • destination

        private String destination
        the destination of this flight as a three letter code. example: VIE. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • origin

        private String origin
        the origin of this flight. example: VIE. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • departure

        private DateTime departure
        the scheduled departure of this flight in UTC.

      • arrival

        private DateTime arrival
        the scheduled arrival of this flight in UTC.

      • vessel

        private Aircraft vessel
        the aircraft assigned to this flight, if any. when no aircraft has been assigned yet this is null.

      • crew

        private java.util.Set<Staff> crew
        the crew members of this flight.

      • passengers

        private java.util.Set<Passenger> passengers
        the passengers added (listed) on this flight.

              String origin,
              String destination,
              DateTime departure,
              DateTime arrival)
        Creates a flight with an id, an origin, a destination and both departure and arrival.
        Calls the final setters.
        Parameters:
        flightID - the id of this flight
        origin - the origin of this flight
        destination - the destination of this flight
        departure - the scheduled departure date and time of this flight
        arrival - the scheduled arrival date and time of this flight

      • Flight

        public Flight​(Flight f)
        Constructs a flight as a deep copy of some original flight.
        All attached objects are duplicated. Both crew and passenger objects are also duplicated.
        Parameters:
        f - the original flight to be copied.

      • add

        public boolean add​(Staff staff)
        Adds a crew member to this flight.
        A crew member cannot be added more than once.
        Parameters:
        staff - the crew member to be added.
        Returns:
        whether the new crew member was successfully added to this flight.

      • add

        public boolean add​(Passenger passenger)
        Adds a passenger to this flight.
        Passengers can only be added once to flight. Passengers are added if the assigned vessel has sufficient capacity or is unknown. Null passengers are rejected.
        Parameters:
        passenger - the passenger to be added
        Returns:
        whether the new passenger was successfully added.

      • readyToBoard

        public boolean readyToBoard()
        Checks whether this flight is ready for boarding.
        A flight is ready for boarding if there is a least one crew member assigned.
        Returns:
        whether this flight is ready for boarding.

      • boardingCompleted

        public boolean boardingCompleted()
        Checks whether boarding is completed.
        Boarding is completed if at least one passenger is added and all currently added passengers have boarded this flight.
        Returns:
        true if all listed passengers boarded this flight, false otherwise.

      • board

        public boolean board​(Passenger p)
        boards a passenger on this flight.
        When the flight is ready for boarding, a passenger can be boarded if he or she has already been added to this flight before board is invoked and is not already boarded on some other flight. Updates the passenger's boarded information.
        Parameters:
        p - the passenger to board
        Returns:
        whether the passenger boarded this flight
